title: Theatre for a New Audience’s 25/26 Season
description: Theatre for a New Audience is proud to celebrate its 46th season featuring David Eldridge’s new version of Henrik Ibsen’s The Wild Duck, William Shakespeare’s The Tragedy of Coriolanus, and Teatro La Plaza’s Hamlet performed in Spanish with projected English translation. Early-bird pricing available until August 11.
address: Polonsky Shakespeare Center, 262 Ashland Place, Brooklyn, NY 11217
cost: $55 per ticket (Early Bird Special: $40 per ticket)
